name: Digital payment solutions
description: Developed and Designed a web and mobile application to tackle overcharing by operators at Aadhar Seva Kendra. Technology Used: Django/Python, React, MySQL, Firebase, Cashfree API, Twilio

name: Golang with React
description: In this project, I built a CRUD application using Golang, MySQL, and React. The backend will be an API in Golang, and the frontend will be implemented in React.

name: Gatsby and GraphQL
description: In this project, I built a digital library application using Gatsby and GraphQL. We'll work with GraphQL to fetch data from a JSON file, and use it in our web applications. We'll have a fully functional digital library application with Gatsby links to demonstrate the lightning-fast speed of the framework.

name: Women Safety Application
description: In this project, an android based smartphone with an integrated feature that alerts and provides location-based information. It provides self-defence and SMS alerts when a woman is in danger. It sends the alert message with Global positioning system(GPS) location to emergency contacts.

name: Inventory Management System
description: The main aim of Inventory management system is to make an easy interface for the admin to manage the warehouse effective and efficiently.
